name: impressively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that people admire or respect: The team played impressively throughout the game. They were taken up an impressively wide staircase and then along a hallway. See
impressive
More examplesFewer examplesThese articles are impressively up to date.The American economy grew impressively after 1983.In general his portraits are impressively accurate .
